SELECT J.JOB_TEST_NO, J.JOB_TEST_TYPE, J.JOB_TEST_TEXT, C.COCO_CD, C.PAR_COCO_CD, C.COCO_STTS FROM JOB_TEST J
INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON J.JOB_TEST_TYPE = C.COCO_CD WHERE JOB_TEST_NO= #{jobTestNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(JOB_TEST_NO) ASC

SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT J.JOB_TEST_NO, J.JOB_TEST_TYPE, J.JOB_TEST_TEXT, C.COCO_CD, C.PAR_COCO_CD, C.COCO_STTS FROM JOB_TEST J INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON J.JOB_TEST_TYPE = C.COCO_CD ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(J.JOB_TEST_NO) ASC ) A
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOB_TEST_RESULT WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TRUNC(JTR_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
